h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Virtuous Bamboo Engraving Location
content: The Virtuous Bamboo Engraving Curios item can be found randomly by defeating Snake Heads enemies in The Webbed Hollow. The best spot to farm it is at the Temple of Yellow Flowers entrance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Virtuous_Bamboo_Engraving.md', within the main section titled 'Virtuous Bamboo Engraving', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Virtuous Bamboo Engraving Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Virtuous Bamboo Engraving Curios item can be found randomly by defeating Snake Heads enemies in The Webbed Hollow. The best spot to farm it is at the Temple of Yellow Flowers entrance.
